text: Ash has three abilities.
A passive ability called Marked for Death

that'll show you the location
of recent death boxes

and allows you to mark
surviving attackers.
Her passive ability provides your team

with a little bit of
reconnaissance information
by scanning a death box
and locating the surviving attackers,
which could still be within proximity.
This could allow you to better plan
your next move accordingly.
Her tactical ability is called Arc Snare,
which is a spinning snare that damages

and tethers the first
enemy that gets too close.

This ability is best used
to catch an enemy off guard

and allow for your squad to
simultaneously shoot at them.
On the other hand, it can be utilized

to discourage an enemy from
aggressively attacking you
and trying to shoot at you at close range.

Her ultimate ability
is called Phase Breach,

which tears open a one-way
portal targeted to a location.
This ability can be used in many ways.

You can use it to enter
a fight from a position
that the enemy wouldn't usually expect.
This way, you can catch them off guard.

Using it to escape or
reposition is a valid cause too.
With how quickly you can activate it,
using it to reposition or get away

could be the deciding factor
in a well-contested gunfight.

Ash's abilities are incredible
for positioning, flanking,

and picking off one enemy at
a time when used properly.

With her ability to create
diversions and move freely,

it can be difficult for
enemies to keep track of her

and can be great for
catching enemies off guard

and giving your team the
early fight advantage.
